data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: bottom-mounted ADCP data: Stillwater Cove, California, USA (SWC001)

This metadata record describes bottom-mounted ADCP data collected at Stillwater Cove, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using an RDI 600 kHz Workhorse Sentinel ADCP beginning 2005-01-06. The instrument depth was 021 meters, in an overall water depth of 022 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The instrument was programmed with a sampling interval of 2.0 minutes and a vertical resolution of 1 meter.
